metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36561 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: XPDF v4.0.4 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via thecomponent /xpdf/AcroForm.cc:538.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

emscripten: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
